name: The crimson cloak of Buju, awash with sigils and golden amulets
data: It increases the users constitution somewhat.
It increases the users wisdom somewhat.
It increases the users intelligence somewhat.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'chaos from invariance'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'order from chaos'.
